Some Scholarly Thoughts on Sex and Gender

I have worked on a variety of research topics that no longer align with the NIH mission as it is currently being redefined by the second Trump administration. I am making my nonsensitive writings and reference documents available here, in a personal capacity:

  • "The Trump Adminstration has Concepts of a Sex": a short piece on the logical and practical flaws in the definition of biological sex laid out in Executive Order #14168, to which NIH is currently beholden
